138b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid do// gsang sngags kyi sgo nas thosro pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa'i spyad pa spyod pas na de de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba rnams ming kho na gtsug gri nor bu ni// sangs rgyas
138b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi yon tan ma tshang ba med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// chos thams cad kyi don yongs su rdzogs pas ma nyams pa'o// lhag tshad med pa zil gyis non par mi nus pa'o// hrI baM \u0f89\u0fa4
138b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhung dung / don 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro bas glegs baM dang / sems pas kun chub par byed pa dang / bsgoms pas tshul bzhin du ying la byed pa'o// mngangs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid zil
138b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi non pa zil gyis mnan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid do// gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa ni// gzi brjid nang du 'phro ba nor bu bdag nyid chen po'o// phyir bzlog pa ni gnyen por gyur pa'o// snyigs ma lnga ni sems can
138b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / lta ba dang / bskal pa dang / tshe dang / yo byad kyi mtshan nyid do// dri ngas dang / skur ba dang / smad pa'i tshig sbyin du 'gro bas mi sbran pa brjod pa'o// yid du 'ong ba ni yid du 'thad pa'o// phyogs bcur dam pa'i
139a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rnga sgra rgyunA mi 'chang par sgrogs pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes pa// chos kyi rgyal srid kyi bdag por 'gyur zhes 'brel pa'o// / oM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma b+hA ba swa b+hA ba b+hi shrad+d+ha
139a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+rA a aHaM aHpra kri ti pa ri shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+ma/ ya tu ta/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA yA/ many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+hi tA mu pA dA ye ti AM aHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hri daM ya ha ra ha ra/ au hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA ne mAr+t+ti
139a3(rgyud 'grel): bA gI shwo ra ma hA pA tsA/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma ga ga nA ma lA su pa shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA ni gar b+ha a'adi ni dang po dang / bar dang / tha mar byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// de ltar yang / a'i rnam pa byang chub kyi sem so//
139a4(rgyud 'grel): sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rang bzhin aH'i rnam pa'o// sangs rgyas nyid mtshon pa aM gi rnam pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa chen po gsal bar byed pa a'i rnam pa'o// ye shes kyi sku byin gyis
139a5(rgyud 'grel): rlob pa po a'i rnam pa'o// lu sa dang / sems dang ngag byin gyis rlob pa po oM hU~M hrIH'i yi ge'o// brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i ngo bo'i dngos po rnams chos rnams kyi dbyings// ngag gi dbang phyug gi bdag nyid ces
139a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don to// chos kyi sku rgyas gdab pa'i don du AH'i rnam pa tha mar brjod do// / de nas shes pa de ma thag tu'o// gang gis dang por gsol ba btab pa'i dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang nges gsang bstod
139b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni tshig 'di gsol lo// zhes 'brel lo// de nyid kyi tshe bde ba skyes pas dga' zhing ngo // slang nas dga' ba skyes pas mgu nas so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i legs pa'i lam rgyu
139b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi tshul bstan cing bshad pa'o// don chen rang bzhin gyi don 'byung ba'i rgyun no// lam 'di yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul te/ spyod yul yin gyi/ gzhan gyi ma yin no zhes gnaso//
139b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mtshan dpal phyag na snying po bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug 'grel chen rjes su 'gro/ legs bsngags don zab dag la brten cing rmad byung kho che'i dka' 'grel rgyas pa dbang por ldan// sna tshogs
139b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi gsang chen rnam par g.yo ldan gdams pa sna tshogs bdud rtsis rgyas gyur pa// nyi ma'i dpal gyis mdor bshang 'di ni dam pa rnams kyi sems la kun nas rgyas gyur cig/ mdor beshang bdud rtsi'i
139b5(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa ma 'khrugs shing // yid 'od brtsams las bdag gis bsod nams ni// gang zhig thob pa de yis 'gro ba rnams// gnyis med bde bdag dang ldan gyur cig// dpal mtshan yang dag
139b6(rgyud 'grel): par brjod pa'i mdor bshang bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon paN+Di ta chen po gnas brtan nyi ma'i dpal ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
140a1(rgyud 'grel): b+hU bA Sh+Ta ma kham po pAd+d+ha t+ta rgyan pa nar bu dpal ma swA dang / thA s+t+ra n+d+he btsun d+hAr+tha bAnA na blo dad la ny+dza ma'i dbang bar 'od zlar rgyuwA la smyanam+b+ha A nAb n+tak+Sha dag sma rA dud+hA
140a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyis bsgyur snying khrus te gtan la phab pa'o// glus rang skyong bI rang bzhin yon tuR+tha tsaH// dpal mtshan yang dag brjod don brgyad pr-I ki/ gang mes pa mchog gi gas
140a3(rgyud 'grel): byed rgyun+da gyis mdzes// bong du sbyar sna grags pa chos rjes bsgyur// de las dge ba gang bskrun de yis 'dir// dpal ldan bla ma bsten mkhas dbang po no// sems chung legs sbyangs skal
140a4(rgyud 'grel): ljon 'dir 'jug cing // kun kyang 'di yi gnas la 'gong par zhe ga/
141a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jal dpal mtshan brjod kyi 'grel pa ladu rtsi'i tshigs pa bzhugs/
141b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA many+dza prI nA ma sa~M gi tA m+b+hi ta bin+d+ha pra t+yA lo ka br-id+d+hA nA ma/ bod srung du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpalA b+hi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sgron ma gas
141b2(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa laM phyag 'tshalo// yu la dang yul can mkha' 'dra rang bzhin can// nyi zla mun pa'i lam zhugs mnga' yis g.yo// sa mtha' las byung chu yis kun tu khyab// bde
141b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs 'jam dbyangs de la bdag phyag 'tshal// bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa yi// bdud rtsi thigs pa lta bu 'di// dang po sangs rgyas legs 'ongs pa// mtshan brjod man ngag bri bar bya// dpal ldan 'bras
141b4(rgyud 'grel): spungs mchod rten du// sna tshogs rgyud don gnyer ba yi// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// sa ga'i bco lnga lnga 'dus so// de dus ston pas 'gro don du// chos dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gi/ dkyil 'khor spros pa
141b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ablas spungs yin// de yi phyi da dA nang dag tu// dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor che// dang po sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor spros// lha la sogs pa thams cad la// dbang bsgyur byin te rgyud sde bzhi// snying
141b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i rgyud dang lnga po dag/ rdo rje 'chang gis rgyas par gsungs// snying po'i snying po 'di yin no// bsdus te mkha'agro ma rnams kyis// rang rang gnas su rgyas gdab bo// snying po'i snying po 'di nga ni// 'gro ba'i
142a1(rgyud 'grel): don du 'dzam bu'i gling // bye ba phrag brgyar glags grub tu// rab tu gragaso 'di yi don// zab cing gting dpag dka' bra ni// sus kyang shes pa ma yin te// zla ba bzang pos dri med bsha
142a2(rgyud 'grel): de don rigs ldan rnams la ni// bdag gis rab tu dgrol bar bya// 'di la bcu bzhir gsungs pa yang // bcu gsum don ldan sgra yi dbyings// gcig ni kun gyis bsngags pa'o// de nyid phyir na 'dir mi
142a3(rgyud 'grel): 'chang // bshad par bya ba bcu gsum ni// zhus dang gsungs dang gzigs pa dang // sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje dbyings// chos dbyings me long so so rtog/ mnyam nyid bya grub rgyud bsdus pa// sngags dang rjesu
142a4(rgyud 'grel): yi rang dang // bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa// de las dang po thog mar ni// zhus pa bcu du ga bstan par bya// 'thad pa ston pa chos kyi sku// dzA lan+d+ha ra'i tha yig las// zhu po tri shaM ku ni yi// a yig rkyen
142a5(rgyud 'grel): pas chos kun 'byung // e bi ma ya zhes bshad pa// de nyid rdo rje btsun mo yi// b+ha gar lar zhugs de nyid ngo // de yang bshad pa// de nas rdo rje'i 'chang dpal ldan// gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi
142a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bas dpa'// gsang dbang rdo rje dbang phyug po zhes pa// a yi rnam pa bdag med ma// rab tu mi gnas stong pa nyid// rnam pa thams cad bral ba'o// tha yi rnam pa
142b1(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa// dmyigs med snying rje chen po la// sna tshogs dngos rnams snang ba'o// rdo rje gnyis med sbyor bya dang // stong pa snying rje'i snying po can// zag gsum 'dzag pa med pa'o// 'chang ba zung 'jug
142b2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid ni// lhan cig 'dzin pas 'chang bar brjod// de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las// bsam pa thams tsod yongs btang nas// stong par rtse gcig yid byed pa// nyi ma gcig tu brtags na yang // gral te
142b3(rgyud 'grel): yid ches ma gyur na// de tshe nga yi brdzun gyi tshig ces pas dam bca' gsungs pa'o// rtags gsum dang po bar tha ma// dang po du sogs lnga thob pa// gnyis pa stong dang brgyad brgya 'gags// tha mar nyi khri
142b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig stong dang // drug brgya 'gags pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpal ni nga las rang don gzhan// dam pa gnyis ni 'byung ba'am// yang ni gnyis med sbyor ldan pas// ril bu bum pa mchi lu lham dang / sa
142b5(rgyud 'grel): 'og mkha' spyod rkang mgyogs dang // gnod sbyin mo dang bcud kyi len// de la sogs pa dpag med mchog/ gdul dka' yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung // khyad par rta pa'i tshogs chen po// nyi khri chig stong drug
142b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya dang // sto nga dang brgyad brgya sum brgya dang // drug cu'i dmag dpung gdul dka' ba'o// ci phyir nyin mtshan gnod byed phyir// 'dul ba drug sogs dpag med kyang // kun gyis thul ba ma yin te// mchog tu
143a1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dzag ye shes che// 'du byed rnams kyi mchog yin no// de ni gang las rnyed ce na// bum pa gtum mo lhan cig skyes// yan lag drug gis lus bcings pa'o// de yang dus kyi
143a2(rgyud 'grel): ra lo las// byed pa bcing pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa gsum po yang 'grub par gyur// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten gsum gyi sgo gsum po// rgyal ba rang lus bde stong rgyas// khro rgyu can las thag
143a3(rgyud 'grel): bsrings pa// gsang ba gsang bra lnga yin te// de yang rdo rje theg pa las// khyod kyis srog chags bsad par bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya// ba rdzun gyi tshig ni
143a4(rgyud 'grel): smra ba yin// myos par gyur pa'i khu ba btung // de ltar spyad na grol bar 'gyur// zhes pa rlung ni srog yin la// de 'gog byed pa srog chags gsong // gzhan gyi bud med rang lus mdzes// rang gi grub pa
143a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag/ ma byin haM las thig le len// sems ca na thams cad bsgral lo zhes/ brdzun gyi tshig ni smra ba yin// bde ba phyag rgya'i khu ba ni// rtag tu btung bar bya ba yin// de lta min par dngos spyod pa//
143a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dmyal bar nges par 'tsheng// dgongs pa'i skad kyis bstan pa yin// dbang po dbang po lnga yin te// dad pa dran pa brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab ldan pa yis// rdo rje theg pa'i lam pa sgrub
143b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rdo rje gsang ldan dbang lnga ldan// de nyid phyir na de dbang phyug/ rnam par rgyas pa rdo rje'i lus// mi yi 'gro ba mchog yin no// pad+ma rtswa la dkar po ni// thig le nu mkhwa'i khams gnas pa'o// spyan ni
143b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar snang ba ste// rtags deng ye shes nor bu brtan// sna tshogs pad+mo rtsa yi dbyibs// gdan la bzhugs ni skye mched dag/ ring gi lag ni ro rkyang gnyis// rdo rje'i mchog ni gnyis med ma// rnam grangs/
143b3(rgyud 'grel): mang la rten nas ni// nyamasu myong bar bya ba'i phyir// gsor bar brtson 'grus gnyen po yis// yang dang yang du byed ces pa// nyamasu myong bar byed pa'o// khro gnyer dpral ba'i thig le la// rim par ldan sogs/

143b5(rgyud 'grel): phrin las gcig go zhes brjod pa'o// dpa' bo de 'joms phyir na dpa'// 'jig su rung ba'i nyanA rang sogs// 'dod yon spyod la skrag pa'o// gzugs ni gnod sbyin nges mi thub// mi thung byis pa'i lus bcwa
143b6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ zhe sdang mi bskyod rdo rje nyid// ces gsungaso// rdo rje lus la rtse mo ni// spyi bo'i haM dang bum pa'i a// rab 'phro ba ni yar mar gshegs// rang gi lag ni yan lag drug/ gsor byed pa ni srog rtsol so/
144a1(rgyud 'grel): gong nas gong du goms byed pa'o// de yang dgos pa ci'i phyir nA// snying rje'i don gyi byang chub sems// dwa yang rdo rje mkha' gro las// ji srid sems can 'khor gnas su// gnas par gyur pa'i bar
144a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag tu// dpal mchog mtshungs med sems can ngon// mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin// de phyir sems dpa' don pa ni// srid pa'i zhigs pas rtag mi 'jigs// srid bde smon pa dgag pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'dod chags
144a3(rgyud 'grel): rab myos pas// rtog pa rgyas pas smin par mdzad// ces gsungs so// de lta'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// shes rab mi rtog chos kyi dbyings// yang na las dang ye shes gnyis// las ni bcos ma ye shes
144a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ de lta'i 'thad pa 'di nyid de// thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog/ 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa'am// so sor bsdu dang lha yi yum// de la brten nas rtogs pa'o// dga' dang bde ba'i ye shes
144a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid// mgu ba mi ngoms spangs pa'o// rangs pa de yi lus sems tshim// btang snyoms can ni thar pa 'dod// 'khor ba spyong sogs gnyis rtog med// khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa// zhes pa stong pa khro bo la//

144b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gnas gshegs pa'o// rdzogs pa dung khang rdzogs pa la// sangs rgyas spang bya spangs thob pa'o// phyag 'tshal zhes pa de la 'dud// thal mo rtsa dang rlung gnyis la// sbyar byas thig le 'phor mi ster//

145a1(rgyud 'grel): mongs pas ni thig le nyams// 'khor ba rgyas par byas pa yi// sems 'khrul bsdu ni de sdug bsngal// sna tshogs rgyas par byas pa'o// mi shes ma rig bag chags spobs// 'dam du bying

145a5(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo'i haM yig la// 'gro ba'i rlung gi lus rnamaso// bla ma thabs mchog me rlung sbyor// gnyis med 'dres pa bde ba che// dam tshig chen po'i thig le bzhi// de nyid mkhyen pa ye shes so// dbang po bskum pa

145b2(rgyud 'grel): pa med cing rnam par spangs// rang nyid kyis rig bsod nams mchog/ dA ri ka pa'i zhal snga nAs// skye ba med pa'i ye shes 'di// rdul med na mkha'i dkyil lta bu// lus gnas bde bas rgya sa pa las// dA ri
145b3(rgyud 'grel): ka pas da lta rnyed// tsas gsungs so// 'jam dpal nor mye'i thig le la// ye shes gnyis myed bde ba'i brten// sems dpa' ling gra rgyas pa'o// ming ni bde chen lhan skyes te// yang dag brjod pa'i

146a1(rgyud 'grel): ba pa/ sgom pa nyamasu myong ba'o// da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pas de don rtogs pa'o// yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang // rdo rje theg pa nyamasu myong // rang la

146a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi gas // sbyor ba'i yan lag drug yin no// 'dzin pa thig le 'dzin pa ste// dga' bzhi ye shes rgyas par byas// nges par 'byung ni haM las skyes// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor bar du ni// rab tu gsal
146a6(rgyud 'grel): bar sems can la// ji ltar bar ni bstan par bya// bdag gis rlung gnyis sbyor ba yis// bsam pa brtan pos thig le gzung // de las phyag rgya chen po thob// nyon mongs nyams pa'i sdug bsngal
146b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ ma lus bsal ba gcod pa dang // mi shes rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs// ma lus spang phyir dngos po bsten// bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du// nyon mongs byang chub yan lag lam// de yang
146b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thob pa las// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi// khams gsum na ni sdig med pas// de bas 'dod la nan tan du// bu khyod kyis ni rtag tu gyis// zhes gsungaso// sems can thig ler gnas pa'o//

146b4(rgyud 'grel): bar ston// gsang dbang nor bu'i yan lag nu// rdo rje yis ni mi bskyod pa// de skad e byaM thabs shes rab// de bzhin gshegs pa gyen gshegs pa'o// bde chen sems la gsol mdzad nas// thabs shes
146b5(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud skar ma'i sbyor ba las// spyan snga 'dug ni rtogs pa'o// de ltarar+ya d+hU tI la brten nas// dga' ba bcu drug rnam dag pas// zhus pa'i tshigs bcad bcu drug dag/ zhus pa'i len
146b6(rgyud 'grel): ste dang po'o// / le'u gnyis pa slar gsungs pa// byis pa'i skye bo gdul slad du// sngo na pa la sogs mi 'ga' la// 'dir chen po'i don bshad pa// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// ces pa
147a1(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang che// a ra li las zas gtsang thabs// sgyu mchen mo shes rab la// dron grub rdo rje sems dpa'o// mchog tu dga' ba bde ba che// bcom ldan 'das
147a2(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag rgya che// rdzogs pa gtsug tor thig le rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'khor drug dag ye shes// rkang gnyis mchog ni bden pa gnyis// yang na gtsug tor nor bu gnyis// nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba// zhes
147a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi ni don bshad pa// 'jig rten kun tu khyab pa yi// ye shes skyes pas ye shes kyi// d+hU tI mthong rtags mthar thug pa// re khA nag po phra ba'i pra// longs sku 'phro ba mthong ba'o// de yang dang po sangs rgyas
147a4(rgyud 'grel): las/ dngu ba smig rgyu srin bu me// zhes pa rtags bcu bstan pa'o// ring zhing rnam par rtog palas// mtshan brtags thob pas blo yangs pa// nyin mtshan rab tu brkyang mdzad de// de yang 'khor lo sdom pa lpa
147a5(rgyud 'grel): gang tshe goms pa brtan gyur pa// gsal snang dngos mthong bar 'gyur// lce DUr phyin pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji srid 'dod pa de srid du// lce 'phel byar ni 'gyur ba yis// de tshe khams gsum po yang blta// zhes
147a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungaso// 'jig rten gsum po lus ngag yid // snang byed cing ni rtsa gsum nyid// bdud ba zhi phung nyon 'chi lta bu// dgra rnams bdud sogs nyon mongs rnams// 'dul byed bde rlung thig le khams// mthul
147b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams kyi lam// 'og ltas rtsa gsum dran song gsum// zag pa rgyas pas 'khor bar 'khor// des na mi 'dzag ye shes gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i lhan cig skyes// 'dzum bstan nas ni dga'
147b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhi// tshangs pa dbu ma'i lam yin te// gsung ni gyen rgyu'i lam yin te// snyan pa bde rlung sil sgra 'byung // 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas// zhes pa bcu drug rtsa rgyas pas// sgo gsum lhan skyes khyab
147b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// lag na rdo rje bsam gtan la// stobs po che ni lhan skyes bde// rim gyis byon pas dga' bzhi rgyas// gsang dbang rdo rje nor bu la// slar gsungs pa ni mthar thug nas// slar la gnas su gshegs pa'o//
147b4(rgyud 'grel): snying rje che dang ldan gyur pas// zhes pa thams cad bAde chen khyab// rang snang bzhin du bzhin snang ba'i// 'gro la rnam par rtog pa'i rlung // phan pa'i don du 'gog par byed// yum lngas longs spyod ldan pa khyod// ye
147b5(rgyud 'grel): shes lus ni rdo rje'i lus// 'jam dpal thig le'i khams yin te// ming brjod dga' bA skad cig ma// don chen rdog par bde ba tshe// dag par byed pa rtog spros bral// bcing[\u0f7f]dgrol tha~Md de bzhin nyid// sdig
147b6(rgyud 'grel): sel ba ni srog gcod sogs// rtsa ba bzhi ngag gos pa med// dil+lo pa yi zhal nas kyang // ri rab gser gyi logs la gang gnas pa// gang gi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang // de bzhin skye mang rtogs pa'i rnal
148a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis// dngos po'i rang bzhin bor nas phyag rgya che// zhes gsungs so// da ni mchog mi 'gyur ye shes// nyan par brtson pa'i rnal 'byor ni// dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang nyid // legs
148a2(rgyud 'grel): so nyon mongs ye shes rtogs// lag na rdo rje sbyor grub la// khyod legs so ni bsgom pa'o// gsang ba tu ga nor bu'i gnas// bdag po lte bar bde ba 'dzin// lhan gcig skyes pa nyams su myong // de phyir gsuM/
148a3(rgyud 'grel): pA'i dus su ni// nga yis khyod la rab tu bstan// khyod ni rtog med rtse gcig pas// yid kyi nyon la bsgom par gyisra// bcom ldan b+ha gra btsun mo'i gnas// de ni skyon nub pas legs zhes// de yang he yi
148a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par spras// rang gi dbang bskur snying rje che// rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer la// spyod pa byed par rtogs par bya// zhes gsungaso// gyen la
148a5(rgyud 'grel): glagashegs pa gasnol ba'o// gtsug tor chen po la sogs pa'i// 'khor lo drug rtsa'i rnam dag pas// slar gsungs blo drug tu ngag/ slar gsung sa pa'i rgya cher 'grel pA sti le'u gnyis pa'o//
148a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs drug la gzigs le'u ni// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// ces pas bcom ldan bde ba la// shAkya stong pa chen po nyid// thub pa nor bu mi 'da' ba'o// gang gis gzigs na de yis gzigs// gang
148b1(rgyud 'grel): la gzigs na rigs drug la// ji ltar gzigs na 'khor lo drug/ sangs rgya sna drug tu gzigs pa'o// gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad ni// 'khor lho drug ltar khyab pa yi// 'od gsal ba ni byang
148b2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems// nor bu'i khu nas mI 'phro ba// mi bskyod rdo rje lhan skyes dga'// badz+ra d+h+r-i ka ste 'jig pa med// gsang sngags lte rtsa yi ge'i gzugs// rig sngags dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'phro// 'chang ba'i rigs
148b3(rgyud 'grel): ni pa yin te// lte ba'i 'khor lo dzi na dzIg/ rnam pa rA snang mdzad chen po'o// rigs gsum+bu rdul mun snying stobs te// rnam par gzigs ni mtshan nyid med// dang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'od dpag
148b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa a ro li ka/ 'jig rten lte ba'i dkyil 'kho la/ 'jig rten 'das pa snying ga nyid// rigs ni rIn chen 'byung ldan la// mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rin 'byung nyid// rata na d+hi ka ste gsal bar byed// 'jig rten zhu
148b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i khu ba la// snang byed bde chen snang ba'o// rigs chen don grub ye shes sku// ha~M las 'bab pa'i phrin las byed// stong pasra brgyan pas prA dz+nyA d+hi ka/ phyag rgya chen po rdo rje sems// rigs mchog rigs bsdu
148b6(rgyud 'grel): bde chen grol// thig le bcu drug yongs rdzogs pa// bco lnga'i mtha' can rnam par dag/ de nyid gtsug tor chen po dang // rin po che yang rdo ngo // chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur ba// de la ston pas cher
149a1(rgyud 'grel): gzigs pa'o// gnas dang phung po dga' ba dang // las dang lha dang ye shes dang // drug ldan de la gzigs pa'o// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyis// sh+lo ka gnyis drug pa'o// ri
149a2(rgyud 'grel): drug la gzigs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni// mngon par byang chub le'u la// tshig gi bdag po sangs rgyas kyis// tshigs su bcad pa sh+lo ka/ rtsa yi dra
149a3(rgyud 'grel): byibi ji snyed pa// bsdus pas 'khor lo drug tu bsdus// de nyid gsang sngags rgyal po 'drug/ ldan zhing badz+ra d+h+rika sna tshogs// 'khor lo drug la ldan pa'o// gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // zhes pa kun
149a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzob don dam la// kun rdzob kun brtags gzhan dbang gnyis// don dam yongs su grub pa ste// med pa bden pa dbyer med la// 'byung ba sku gsum 'byung ba'o// yang na mtha' bzhi bral ba yi// chos kyi
149a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi rang bzhin no// nang du gnyis ni ro rgyang gnyis// de ni rtagra chad mtha' yin pas// myed pa kun 'dar ma nyid do// ma skyes rang bzhin r-I gtsug par// 'byung ba bde chen mchog mI 'gyur// de nyid mi
149a6(rgyud 'grel): skye chos can no// 'di gsungs pa ni bsam brjod med// a A i I u A e ai o au oM aHzhes pa 'di yi don bshad na// ma ning bzhi ni ma bshad pa// skye med ston pa'i rgyud yin phyir//
149b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bcu gnyis bstan pa ni// sa bcu gnyisu bstan pa yin// gnas dang nye bu'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni// tshan ngo nye ba'i tshun dro dang // 'du sa nye ba'i 'dus dang // 'thung gcod nye bu'i 'thung
149b2(rgyud 'grel): gcod dang // dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang // thung ngu drug ni dang po la// ring ba drug ni nye ba'o// 'khor lo drug la 'jug pa dang // gnas la ljongs spyod thim pa dang // bzhi bzhis rlung 'gags mchog thob po// 'o na
149b3(rgyud 'grel): thob lam sa de gang // we nu a sogs bcu gnyis ni// kun tu 'ong dang bdud rtsi 'ong // na mkha' 'od dang rdo rje 'ong // rin chen 'ong dang pad+ma'i 'ong me tog 'ong dang dpe med 'ong // bla med 'ong dang shes rab
149b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od/ kun mkhyen dang ni so sor rig/ dang po'i thung gsum sgo gsum dga'// dang po ring gsum mchog tu dga'// gnyis pa thung gsum dga' bral la// ring gsum lhan cig skyes dga'o// dga' bzhi'i rang bzhin
149b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol phyin// ma skyes pa'i don bshad pa'o// de la skye ba'i rnam 'phrul ni// s+thi to hr-i di thig le la// dz+nyA na mAr+t+ti bde chen te// rA haM bud d+ho spangs rtogs ldan// bud+d+hA nA ni d+hA tI'o// t+yu d+hA war+t+ti nAM ni rlung gsum sgom//
149b6(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra trik+ShA zhes pa ni// nor bu mi bskyod rlung gcod pa'o// du khaHsrid pa ts+tshe da ni// lte ba'i nang gnas rnam snang mdzad// pradz+nyA shes rab 'od dpag med// dz+nyA na mAr DitA ye snying ga/ dz+nyA na kA ya don grub ste// dpral
150a1(rgyud 'grel): bar gnas pa thig le'i khams// bA gI shwa ra rIn chen 'byung // mgrin par chos kyi phung po gnas// a ra pa tsa nA rdor sems// gtsug tor gnas pa bcom ldan 'das// ya te na maHde phyag
150a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// yang na a ra pa tsa na// zhes pa'i yi ge'i don bshad nA// mi 'gyur ya shes rtogs pa yis// 'dod chags la soT sman chen bsten// mi 'chi lnga spyang dngos grub thob// gsang spyong rigs spyod kun tu bzang // /
150a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rig pas spyang par bya// in+d+ra b+hU ti'i gsung ngag yin// de ltar tshigs bcang gsum pa des// lus ngag yid gsum rnam dag pa'o// sngags kyi rgya cher 'brel pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// /
150a4(rgyud 'grel): le'u lnga pa rdo rje dbyings// dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa ni// phung khams dag pa chos kyi dbyings// 'di ltar phyag rgya chen po la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ling ga/ rtag tu rgyas bde kun tu bzang // rdzogs
150a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas nor rgyas pa'o// a las 'byung ni shes rab phyin// 'od gsal phyag rgya chen mo la// gzugs brnyan snang ba mA ma ki// A ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ ma ning rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin// rlung 'gog
150a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa mchog sgrol ma// don chen yi ge yon tan la// dam pa thams cad ster bar byed// khong nas 'byung ba gtum mo'i me// de yang he yi rdo rje las// lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis// de bzhin gshegs
150b1(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga bsregs te// spyan sogs yang ni bsregs byas nas// haM las ri bong can 'dzag go/ zhes gsungaso// srog chen rdzogs byed gos dkar mo// tshig tu brjod pa nyams pa'i mtha'// spangs pa bde
150b2(rgyud 'grel): chen brtan spyan ma// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ bde stong dbyer med ye shes so// tshig kun rtsa rlung yi ge'i gzugs// gtum mos klags pas bde stong gsal// de nyid rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// nyamasu
150b3(rgyud 'grel): myong ba mtsho da pA ste// phyi rol rdzas rnams rgya chen phul// dam pa gsum gyis bsngo byas nas// 'di phyi'i yon tan rjes 'brangs pas// thar pa'i rgyur gyur shin tu dka'// thar pa'i rtsi smos khams gong ma'i//
150b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyur gyur pa yang ting 'dzin na// de byed rnam par g.yengs phyir ro// des na mchod chen ma yin no// bdud rtsi bsten sogs 'dod yon spyod// de yang brgyud pa'i rgyu min pas// mchod rten ma yin mchod chen ni//
150b5(rgyud 'grel): du ga lnga'i de nyid rtogs pa de'i// gsum pa'i ye shes gcig pu yin// chen po'i shes rab ye shes so// 'dod chags gsum du sa ye shes che// sems can las can skal bzangs la// sgo gsum
150b6(rgyud 'grel): dpag med dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po gong bzhin la// zhe sdang che ni rlung 'gog pa'o// des ni bde g.yos rtog med pas// spang bya nyon mongs kun gyi sgra// che ba 'di las mi bskyod pa'o// mchod pa
151a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po gti mug che// srog rtsolA d+hA ti'i lam zhugs pas// gti mug blo ni shes rab la// gti mug sel ba snang mdzad pa'o// mchod pa chen po gong dang mtshungs// khro ba chen po nyams pa 'joms//
151a2(rgyud 'grel): yang na dga' bral ye shes la// khro ba chen po lhan cig skyes// drag po chen po don grub bo// mchod pa chen po 'dod pa che// bde bas sems bsdus mi rtog rgyas// de yis 'dod pa thams cad nyid// sel bar byed
151a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir rin po che// chags pa nyid na chags pa med// 'dod sogs lnga po dbyer med pa// drug pa rdor 'chang dus 'khor lo// 'dod pa chen po lus bde ba// bde ba chen po ngag bde ba// dga' ba chen po sems bdi
151a4(rgyud 'grel): bo// mgu ba che ni ye shes bde// de yang mu log gnyid sang dang // rmi lam rmi lam chen po dang // de nyid sbrul longs chos bde chen// dga' ba dga' bzhir nyams su myong // gzugs tshwa thig les mying gA rgyus/

151a6(rgyud 'grel): che zhing mchog gsang theg/ rgya che ngas khyab bde sems ngag 'o// dkyil ni bde ba snying po la// 'khor ni rtsa thig rlung gis bskor// chen po 'i chos nyid yangs pa yi ni// sgyu ma lta bur shar ba'o// de ni ye shes
151b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog dga'o// de ni longs sku'i dga' bzhi'o// shes rab mtshon chen stong pa nyid// 'chang ba dngos rnams 'joms pa ste// nyon mongs chen po las rgya yi// pad+ma la brten skyes pa yi// bde myong
151b2(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi dga' bral dga'// lcags kyu'i mchog ni ye shes kyi// 'dod pas 'khrig chags bzhi bde ba// dri ni ngag gi dga' brel dga'// grag chen me rlung sgra yin la// snyan grags gsal snang ye shes
151b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ sems kyi dga' bral dga' ba'o// snang ba chen po rdo rje thabs// gsal ba chen po shes rab yum// gnyis med sbyor bas bde rgyas pa// ye shes dga'abrel dga' ba'o// mkhas pa bde ste nga thabs
151b4(rgyud 'grel): la mkhas// sgyu 'phrul snang stong chen po 'chang // de ni lus kyi lhan skyes dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po phyag rgya bzhi// grub pa med pas don grub pa'o// dag gi lhan cig skyes dga' ba'o// sgyu 'phrul chen
151b5(rgyud 'grel): po b+ha gra la// dga' bas dga' ni bde myong ba'o// de ni sems kyi lhan skyes dga'o// sgyu 'phrul chen po rtsa 'khor lo// mig 'phrul can ni zhen pa'o// de ni ye shes lhan skyes dga'// gra tsug tor rdo rje
151b6(rgyud 'grel): nor bu'i bar// dga' gsum dga' ba bcu gnyis las// mas yar dga' ba dga' ba bzhi ste// gnyis mnyam gnyis gnas dbus ngag na// bde dang mi rtog mtshan dang bral// lhan cig skyes pa'i yul
152a1(rgyud 'grel): can la// dga' bral rtog zhes brjod do gsung // dga' ba rnam pa bcu drug go// rgyus par bshang ba dri med ltos// sbyin bdag chen po phyi nang gtong // gtso bo skrag mos lhun+da skyes ster// 'jig
152a2(rgyud 'grel): rterkyen+ya sbyin las khyud par 'phags// tshul khrims chen po byang chub sems// 'chang ba mi nyams nor bu yis// rtse mor phreng bA ma nyams mchog/ bzod chen bde bos sems bsdus blus// 'chang ba mi 'phro brtun pa'o//
152a3(rgyud 'grel): na 'grus chen po g.yas g.yon rlung // d+hU tIr brtul ba 'phar g.yo gar// bsam gtan chen po bde stong la// ting 'dzin me tog rtse gcig blta// shes rab chen po stong pa nyid// lus nI ma rig mun pa'i

152b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chen po ling ga rgyas// 'chang ba rdo rje 'jigs byed do// de nyid drag po chen po ste// drag shul chen po dug gsum 'joms// 'jigs chen rtag pa 'jigs par byed// 'jigs par byed pa chang pa 'joms/
153a1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po rigs mchog phyag rgya che// chen po de la lhag med pa'o// bla ma bde ba chen po la// gsang sngags bde ba'i dam tshig bsrung // che ba'i mchog ni thabs mchog go/ theg pa chen po'i tshul

153a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ rig pa bzhi yi bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// ces pa bum dbang rdzas bcu ste// gsum pa rdzas gsum ster sbyin pa// gnyis sbyor byang sems brtan 'dzin pa// tshul khrims rtog bral
153b1(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa'o// brtson 'grus pa thag tsam mi 'jig/ bde stong myi g.yo bsam gtan no// shes rab lha mo'i phyag rgya las// bla ma'i zhal las rnyed pa'o// thabs ni gong gI ma rtogs na// ka ra na bcu la brten nas//
153b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gog drang bzlog dang khyab sogs thabs// de yang sdom pa rgya mtsho lus// kun tu tsum pra kuN+Da li// na khas rtse dang nga na ngas rtse// yang dag sbyor dang srid ces smra// nyed cing skyes pa ltar byed pa// brgyad la brgyad brgyad
153b3(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba yis// byed pa drug cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur// zhes gsungaso// smon lam bde chen mi 'brel ba// stobs ni zlog dka' zlog pa'o// ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'o// phyin bcu thob pas dbang rdzogs pa'o// de yang
153b4(rgyud 'grel): kAm+b+hi'i zhal sna nas// dUr khrod chen po'i dgon par rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// gser snong dag tu seng ge'i 'o lcags chen phan tshun du// dbul ba sel dang bsil po thob pas dang po dang po gnyis// rjes chags
153b5(rgyud 'grel): khyo med le lo med pas gnyis pas gsum dang bzhi// rtse gcig rtog bral gsum pas lci bu drug pa de bzhin gzhan// 'grog len khyabo byed gnas pa 'khrul 'khor rlung thabs stobs// granas dang nye gnas la
153b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs bcu gnyis smon 'debs de bzhin nyid// bde dang cig shos dbyer med gnas pa bzhi ni bzhi pa ste// bla ma dam pa'i drin gyis bdag la 'di 'dra gsal bar snang zhes gsungaso// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/
154a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa khams bcu 'joms pa ste// rlung dang sems dang byang chub sems// khrag dang rkang dang nus pa dang // rus pa sha dang dbang po dang // pags pa la sogs bcu po nga// bde bas khyab brtan gnas
154a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nyid gnas dang dag par 'dod// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// zhes pa yul dang yul can dag/ pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul// ces pa kA ru na bcu yis// bde stong skyes pa tshul chen no// mgon po bde tshan he ru
154a3(rgyud 'grel): kaHsa bcu gnas dang nye gnas stsogs// dbang phyug mi 'dzag dga' ye shes// sa bcu la ni gnas pa'o// zhes pa ka ra na bcu la// sbyin sogs re res brgyan pa'o// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// zhes pa lta
154a4(rgyud 'grel): stangs shes pa las// rnam drug thob rtags rnam pa bcu// du ba smig chu srin bu me// 'bar ba zla sngon mkha' dag dang // thig le ra l-I nag po'o// bdag nyid can+da ni sna tshogs pa'o// longs sku mthong ba yin par 'dod//
154a5(rgyud 'grel): shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba'o// zhes pa bug med na mkha' dag/ blta sa te dbang po yul yul cen// gcig tu gyur pa mthong ba ni// sbyor ba yan lag drug yin te// rtags rdzogs ldan pa 'chang ba yin// dpal ldan
154a6(rgyud 'grel): dang po sangs rgyas las// na mkhar sems gtad mig mi 'dzum// rdo rje lam zhugs rtags bcu mthong // zhes so// rnam pa bcu po de na bcu'i don// zhes pa rnam bcu gong rtags la// sha la sogs pa spyan lnga
154b1(rgyud 'grel): yis// yul dang yul can mthong ba'o// thub dbang stobs bcu zhes pa ni// gyen thur med khyab srog dang ni// klu dang rus rtsangs nor lha sbyin// khyab pa'i bdag nyid bde stong ngo // kun gyi nyi khri chig stong la// don
154b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'gog cing mu lus byed// rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po// me dang zla ba nyi ma dang // thig le nag po thig le tshe// sangs rgyas longs sku mthong ba'o// de yang dang po sangs rgyas lngas// tshe las yo byad skye dang chos// rdzu
154b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul mos smon sems ye shes// rtags bcu'i grub pa dbang bcu'o// zhes gsungaso// thog ma med pas dga' ba la// spros med bdag ni mchog draga'o// de bzhin nyid ni lhan cig skyes// dag pa'i bdag ni
154b4(rgyud 'grel): druga'i brulo// bri ngan par rang bzhin myong bzhin pa// smra zhing rig ste ldan bu la ni// tshig mi 'gyur ni don dang rtags// bde bu che la sbyor ba'o// shes rab bu ni bla ma yis// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// ces pa 'dzag pa
154b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod bA'o// gnyis myed gnyis su med par ston// ces pa 'di yi don bshad na// dang po rtog pa sgom pa ste// de nas rtog me nga skye ba yin// zer ba thad rgyu 'dra las// 'bras bu 'dra ba byung phyir ro// sA lu las
154b6(rgyud 'grel): ni khra min no// des na rtog med rgyu las ni// 'bras bu rtog med ye shes skye// yang dag ye shes mtha' nor bu// de la rnam par gnas pa ni// mi 'dzag ye shes dga' ba'i sems// bdag med chos rnams brjod/
155a1(rgyud 'grel): du med// seng ge rims gnon sgra ldan pas// mu stegs de nyid mi shes pa// stong sgras ri dwags dran 'jigs byed// kun tu 'gro ba bde chen po// don yod stobs ni sbyor bas brtsom
155a2(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bab pa de bzhin du// dung khang gnas su slar gshegs pa'i// bde chen khyab pa yid ltar mgyogs// rgyal ba 'dod chags las rgyal dga'// rnam rgyal rlung rgyal dga' ye she sa// dgra
155a3(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal ba ma rig sogs// rten 'brel lasnga rgyal lhan skyes so// 'khor lo drug la sbyar ba ni// rtsa la thig le brgyan pa'o// stobs po che ni dpung bzhi ste// snang ba thob dang snang ba mched// brtan dang de kho na
155a4(rgyud 'grel): zhus bzhi'o// tshogs kyi stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// slob dpon shu kra ye shes so// tshogs kyi dga' gsum mchog ldan skyes// tshogs ni skad cig gsum yin te// rdzi ni mtshan med skad cig ma/
155a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ni phyag rgya gsum yin te// bdag pa phyogs rgya chen po'o// chos can bco brgyad de dag la// dbang dang ldan pas dbang ldan no// mthu chen bde chen gces pa la// rtag tu nyams med 'dzin pa ste//
155a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid tshul chen rtag bcu thob// gzhan dring mi 'jog bcos ma med// tshig rje ngag gis mchog sbyin nus// tshig ni so sor yang dag rig/ tshig bdag smra mkhas ces pa ni// grub chen brgyad sogs pa
155b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// tshigs gis nus pas des tshig rig/ tshig la dbang bu don rig pa'o// tshig mtha' yas pa shes rab rgyas// spobs pa so sor rig pa'o// tshig bden kun rdzob lha dkyil 'khor// bden par smra ba
155b2(rgyud 'grel): don ngam ste// rdzogs rim rnam pa bzhi yin no// de yang mkha 'gro kun spyod las// thams cad bden pa gnyis la ni// brten par ngas ni rtag bshad pa// rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub phyir// sgom par
155b3(rgyud 'grel): mngon du gyur pa yin// rgyud rnams kyi ni rnal 'byor pa// bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten// zhes gsungs so// bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal sogs// ston pa 'o ni dga' bzhir ston// phyir mi ldog pa
155b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung grub pas// phyir mi 'ong ba thig le brtan// 'dren pa rlung gis rig gi rlung // hUM lus bde rlung 'dren pa'o// rang rgyal de yis khams rgyas pa// bse ru a pra d+hU tI yin// tshul ni mya ngan 'das pa'o// nges
155b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung rdzogaswA pa'i sangs rgyu so// sna tshogs theg pa sna tshogs lam// lus byung ji ltar de ltar snang // 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po// zhes pa 'byung ba lnga yin le// chen po de las chos kun+da skyes// rgyu ni
155b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang rkyen nyid do// gcig po chos dang chos can gyi// rgyu rkyen gyur pa 'di nyid yin// chos ni 'byung la chos can ni// rnam par shes pa de la drug/ shes pa skye ba'ang chos yin te// shes pa nyid na ci zhig shwe/
156a1(rgyud 'grel): shes med sems ni 'od gsal ba// don dam des na mya ngan 'das// 'du shes med 'gog snyoms 'jug yin// theg pa chen po'i bsgrub bya ni// sring pa gsum lnga dmigs nas ni// mig
156a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul lta bu'i rnam pa yis// lam la thub pa'i yon tan len// kun rdzob 'khor dang myang 'das gnyis// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'o// de nyid don du bden 'dod pa// nyan thos phyi rol pa yi lugs// shes pa snang ba
156a3(rgyud 'grel): yin no zhes// gsal ba dam pa'i don 'dod pa// cig shos rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// khyad par cung zad yod min pas// kun rdzob mig 'phrul lta bur snang // don dam rang bzhin med pa
156a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid gnyis med phyag rgya chen por 'dod// rdo rje gsum gyi byed pa la// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur chos rnams gnas// sku rdo rje la sra ba saM// ga shrer ba chu ste dro ba me// bskyod pa rlung ste go 'bying mkha'// gsung rdo rje yi rnam
156a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ A li shes rab yo shes khams// kA li thabs las khams lnga 'byung // kaM tsa Ta tra pa lnga sa// kha tsha tha tha pha lnga chu// ga dza Da d+ha ba lnga me// g+ha NAM b+haM d+ha b+ha lnga rlung // nga nya NA na ma lnga mkha'// ka tsa Ta ta pra lnga ye shesa?/
156a6(rgyud 'grel): mgrin rkan spyi bo ma chu so las// 'byung phyir mkha'i rlung me chu sa// a kra ma~M ha ko swa ni// mgrin sgran mkha'i khams yin no// i tsuk+Sha ya~M sha lde naM// rkan sgra rung gi khams yin no// ri nu ra Sha ar lde ni// spyi bo'i sgra
156b1(rgyud 'grel): ste ma yi khams// u pA pr-I wA o lnga ni// mchu sgra chu yi khams yin no// lit+tA la sa a wA ni// sngo s+thA sA yi khams yin no// 'byung gnas lnga las byung bya yi// 'byung ba'i nus pa'i me tog ni// kha dog yi ge/
156b2(rgyud 'grel): dudrug lngar smin// yi ge dang po'i sgra rtag pa// dbyangs sgra dbyangs la gsal byed dgra// gsal byed rang nyi yin par 'dong // gsal dbyangs thabs shes gnod pa med// dbyangs yig dgra gyur 'chi ba ste// gsal
156b3(rgyud 'grel): byed dgrar gyur nad kyis thebs// yan lag dgrar gyur dpal 'phrog byed// dbang thang myi mthun rnyed pa med// de rnams mthun par gyur pas na// tshe ring nad med dpal 'byor ldan// phal pas btang snyoms 'bras
156b4(rgyud 'grel): gros la min// chu dgra rlung la rlung dgra sa// sa dgra me la me dgra chu// na mkha' kun grogs mthun pa'o// sa bshes chu la chu shis sa// me bshes rlung la rlung shes me// rlung bran chu la me bran saM// chu bran
156b5(rgyud 'grel): me las phran rlung // dgraste gnod pa shes kyi phan par byed// bran ni tshur phan par ga nod pa'o// phal pas gsum char med par 'dod// 'byung chen srog la'abyung chung lus// yan lag dpal la rkyen dbang thang //

157a1(rgyud 'grel): mang zhing // sems med dpal med longaste spyod 'grib// phral byas phyan dang gnod pa med// blun gyis gcig gnod gcig la phan// mkhas gnyis dbyings dang ye shes bzang // gsuM
157a2(rgyud 'grel): ni dbyer med mchog yin te// bzhi pas bshig par byed pa yi rten// rlung gnyis srog rtsol ngan pa ste// gsum gyi ye shes bzang por 'gyur// me gnyis phal pa yun thung 'thab// gsum ni sdug bsngal sna
157a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'khrug/ chu gnyis bzang po gsum yang btub// bzhi pa thams cad grong dang mtshungs// sa gnyis bzang po gsum pa btub// bzhi pa bzang po lnga pa spang // phan tshun phan gnod stobs las shes//
157a4(rgyud 'grel): stobs mnyam dpal dang dbang thang srog/ gsum gyis stobs las phan tshun shes// de mnyam kun du 'gran par byos// phan 'a dogs de yi grogs kyis bye// gnod byed de yi dgra yis bya// tshe dang nan dang
157a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang grog/ srog lus dpal dang dbang thang la// de dang de yi gnyen pos byed// sa ni ser po sa gru bzhi// chu ni dkar po chu zlum po// me ni dmar po me gu gsum// rlung ni sngon po rlung zla gam// na mkha' kun
157a6(rgyud 'grel): grogs mdog dbyibs bral// de nyid gcig tu phan gnod dka'// 'byung ba ro la las drug sde// bsnun dang dbab dang bsreg pa dang // tshim dang gso dang dgyes pa'o// re re'i ba thig las brgyan par bya// sgron
157b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i ming la mtshon byas na// au hwAHphaT nI bsnun pa'o// oM AHhUM ni 'bebs pa'o// au n+taHbo ShaT sreg pa'o// au wAHna ma tshim pa'o// oM lhaHsA hA gso pa'o// oM AM pa ShaT dgyes pa'o// 'byung
157b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dar dang rgyud dang mnyam// gsos btab shes smad gnyis gnyis na sa// re re lu yang shes par bya// 'byung chung nyi shu rtsa lnga la// dbyibs maM dog lus kyang nyi shu lnga// dus phyogs nyon mongs nyi
157b3(rgyud 'grel): shu lnga/ spo nga thob 'dod pas shes par bya// sham+b+ha la dang 9sing ga gling // 'dzam bu gling sogs dpag med no// yi ge grangs dang gaug se dang // maung mi 'dra ba gang yod kyang // 'byung gnas lnga las byung shes pa//
157b4(rgyud 'grel): de yis sgra rnams thams cad shes// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi// sngags kyi de nyid mi shes par// gang zhig lha sgrub las byed pa// nam mkha' bza' bar 'dod dang mtshungs// de phyir sngags
157b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la ni// phan 'dod dri med 'od kyi don// cung zad bdag gis 'dir ni blangs// de yang dgyes pa rdo rje las// po la kr-ik+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba sa yi khams// gsher ba chu ste dro bo me// bskyod
157b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rlung khams bde na mkha'// lnga yis yongasu bskor ba yin// dge slong nyon mongs med pa'o// dgra bcom 'dod chags bde 'gyur ba// zag pa dri chu khu zad pa'o// 'dod chags 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga//
158a1(rgyud 'grel): bral bas dbang gsum ye shes lnga// dbang po thul ba bzhi pa'i dus// bde ba rnyed pas mi 'jig pa'o// 'jigs med thob ni 'khor ba med// bsil bar gyur pa chags pa zang // rnyog pa med
158a2(rgyud 'grel): ni dngas ma'o// de yang 'khor lo sdom pa las// 'dod pa'i 'dod chagasna rnam par spangs// gdul bya de rnams shes nas kyang // yi ge las byung rnam par spangs// tshangs pa nyid du gyur nas phyis// na mkha' lta

158b5(rgyud 'grel): yo shes thob// 'di ni rdo rje 'chang chen po// de yang gsungs pa// rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis// dngos po gang la gang rtog pa// de nyid kun du brtags pa yi// ngo bo nyid med de meng ngo // zhes gsungs so//

159a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid khro bor sprul// ltar ji ltar btul gyur pa// 'di yi byed pa rdo rje sems// zhes gsungs so// bsod nams snying rje chen po la// ldan pa chags pa'i glan pa'o// bsod nams mi 'dzag byed
159a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems// tshogs ni phyag rgya chen po'i thabs// de yang / lus la ye shes chen po gnas// 'di rtogs grol bar kun 'dod la// de rtogs thabs ni bsod ye shes// yin par kun mthun thabs mi mkhas// bsod
159a3(rgyud 'grel): nams phyir sngogs ye shes ni// blo yis byas pas thar pa ring // 'dir ni bsod nams dkyil 'khor che// bcud rnams kyis mchod gnyis 'phel bas// bde stong rgyas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'di 'dra bsod nams gang

159a5(rgyud 'grel): nor bu dmigs med bde// ye shes hUM skyes thig le'i khams// 'byung gnas chu ni de nyid do// de yang rgyud las 'di skad gsung sa// rA btsongs pa yi sbyor ba yis// rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsregs//
159a6(rgyud 'grel): rtog med ye shes la sbyor ba// lus kyi thabs la brten pa mchog/ ces gsungaso// rang las ye shes ldan pa yis// yong mi shes pa 'di yin te// pha rol ye shes yod med shes// yang na mtha' bral
159b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'o// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o// zhes pa bya spu'i bu ga nas// sprul pa sprul te 'gro don nus// 'di 'dra'i bde stong snying rje'i sems// myed par dka' thub zas spong sogs// rgya mtsho
159b2(rgyud 'grel): rus sbal khrog gsho 'dra// rtag pa mi nyams kun rgyal ba// rtsa stong phrag ni bdun cu gnyis// bde tshun rang bzhin rgyas pa ste// rnal 'byor can ni sgo gsum dag/ de yang lus las gsungs pa
159b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni de bshad do// zhes so// bsam gtan dga' bzhi bsam bya ni// rung dang rtsa rnams dran pa'o// yang na snying gar pad+ma'i gnas// cha ming dran pa
159b4(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan mchog/ so sor ring rig mi g.yo bya// zhes pa gzhon nu sa ha dzA// rig la smra bar ma nus pa'o// mchog gi dang po lhan cig skyes// sku gsum 'chang ba rdo rje sems// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid
159b5(rgyud 'grel): can/ zhes pa ma log log pa dang // rmi lam rmi lam chen po dang // sad pa gnas skabs lnga po ni// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid do// khyab bdag lhan cig skyes pa la// ye shes lnga ni gnas skabs
159b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga rje/ ye shes dag dang ldan pa'o// de yang haM yi rdo rje las// bo le kak+ko la sbyor nas// shes pa 'di ru sbyor ba yin// sangs rgyas lnga bdag rigs lnga la// tsaung pan lnga phung dag rtagasu// sna tshogs rdo rje
160a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba'o// spyan lnga mtshan+da ma'i rtags lnga la// bltas pas chags pa med pa 'chang // de yang dra ba sdom pa las// dang po ri dwags sred du snang ba ste// mtshan ma gnyis pa dung kha'i
160a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa can// gsum pa me khyer dang 'dra bzhi pa ni// sprin med na mkha' mtshan ma lnga pa ni// shin tu 'od gsal rang gi snang bya 'char// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad skyes pa'o// zhes pa
160a3(rgyud 'grel): sbrul longs sogs mthong la// nyin mo'i rtags mthong mngon shes drug/ sangs rgyas sras po byang chub sems// dam pa'i mchog ni de bskyed pa'o// shes pa srid 'byung dkyil 'kho ra la// skye gnas med
160a4(rgyud 'grel): no rdzogs pa'i rim// de yang gsungs pa// skyed pa'i rim la rab gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom byed pa// sangs rgyas thabs dang ldan pa yis// skas kyi sen+da mo bzhin du bshang // cesra gsung
160a5(rgyud 'grel): sngo/ chos las 'byung ba b+ha ga lA// baM gzhag pa yi srid pa sel// gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag/ ces pas lhan skyes ye shes so// dngos de skyes ma thag tu ni// kun gyi don grub 'gro ba'i bdag
160a6(rgyud 'grel): smin cing 'khrul 'khor ldan pa yis// nam mkha' las byung rang 'byung ba// rtags brgyad mthong ba 'di lta ste// shes rab ye shes me bo che// rang sems 'bar ba'i rnam pa can// mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes
160b1(rgyud 'grel): chetshe/ bod chen+d+ra rnam par sbyang bar byed// zla bya'i ye shes rnam snang mdzadadA// ye shes snang ba lam me ba// nyi ma'i ye shes rin chen 'byung // 'gro ba'i ye shes mar me smon// rA hu ye shes don yod
160b2(rgyud 'grel): grub// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// glog gi ye shes mthi' yas nyid// sngags drag mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// thig le gnas pa'i ye shes te// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid do//
160b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// zla sngon snang ba'i ye shes ni// he ru ka dpal nyid du 'dod// gtsug tor chen po'i lta stangs kyis// re khA nag po ye shes mthong // dus kyi 'khor lo thong pa can//
160b4(rgyud 'grel): rmad byung gtsug ni rdo rje 'chung // thums cad ma thong ba mthang mchog thob pa'o// na mkha'i bdag po ta ra nu// sna tshogs ston pa yon tan no// de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas las// ta ra na bcings yon tan
160b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis// srid pa gsum po ma g.yos pas// nam mkha'i bdug poR+Sha nga gyur te// rtags bcu la sogs sna tshog sI ston// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po ni// rtags rnams snang bas dngos
160b6(rgyud 'grel): po mchog/ de 'dra mthong ba'i rnal 'byor te// kun dga' chen po'i mig dang ldan// ldan chos lta stangs bzhi yin te// sna tshogs gzugs can rtags mtshan rnams// skyes pa po ni yan lag drug/
161a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing brjod pa bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// drung srong chen po bcom ldan 'das// rigs gsum gnas dang zhing ye shes// 'chang ba de la bde ba yod// gsang sngags 'chang ni rnal 'byor
161a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ thig le mi nyams gsang sngags 'dzin// de ma tshig chen po rtag tu bde// gtso bo rtsa gsum dkon mchog gsum// 'dzin pa de nang thig le 'dzin// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// zhes pa lhan
161a3(rgyud 'grel): skyes ye shes rten// kal pa dang ni khyogs gdugs so// don yod thig le zhags pa ni// rlung gi 'bigs pas rnam par rgyal// 'dzin pa 'khor lo drug tu ni// rlung 'gog chen po rdo rje zhags// rlung gis
161a4(rgyud 'grel): dongo blangs rdo rje yi// lcags kyu zhags po che zhes bya// yang na zhags pa che zhes pa// lte ba'i 'og rtsa 'khyil ba ni// nor rgyas ming can rlung de yis// d+hA tI naswa 'phags byang sems 'gugs// de la zhags
161a5(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes brjod do// lus ni yul chen+da nyi shu bzhi// dpralA bA la sogs sbyar ba dang // snying dbus pad+ma'i 'dab mar ldanA// gnas gtso yin te rtsa lnga yis// tshigs bcad nyi shu rtse lnga dgra/ rnam par snang
161a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / le'u bdun pa rdo rje'i rigs// tshigs su bcad pa bcu dang gcig/ dang po rdo rje 'jigs byed ni// rdo rje a bi
161b1(rgyud 'grel): d+hU tI la// de nang rlung ni 'jigs byed do// 'jig par byed ni de rtogs ga shig/ khro bo'i rgyal po dga' bral mtha'// so sor sdung sogs gdong drug la// 'jigs pa des ni rtog pa gcod// mig drug mngon
161b2(rgyud 'grel): she saM lag drug rtags// stobs dang ldan ni 'dod chags kyis// chags pa thams cad 'joms pa'o// kenga? rus spyi bo'i haM dkar po// mche ba aM shwang gtsigs pa'o// bla ma'i gdams pas gtum mo spor//
161b3(rgyud 'grel): ha la ha la mkha' ye shes// gdong brgya rtsa rlung spong ba yi// ye shes mi 'dra gdong brgya'o// gshin rje gnyis med ye shes te// gshed po de yis gnyis snang 'joms// bgegs kyi rgyal ni bdud bzhi
161b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu la/ rdo rje yang dag ye shes la// shugs can zhes pas 'jigs par byed// rdo rje drag po lus ngag yid // gsang ba 'dus sogs lus gsungaso// rdo rje snying po chos kyi tshul// sgyu 'phrul mA yA e dang baM/
161b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lding ga gsus po ni// rgyas shing shin tu rgyas pa'o// rdo rje las skyes rdor bum+b+ha nang // dzA lan+da d+ha ra dbu rgyan par// bde bas gang la rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje snying pos sku gsung thugs// mkha' je gsang gnas
161b6(rgyud 'grel): las skyes bde// mi g.yo srog rtsol gnas pa la// ral pa gcig pa ro gcig grol// bsgyings pa de 'dra gang yod pa'o// glang chen bde ba ko rlon ni// lus kun khyab cing mnyes par byas/ de ldan pas na
162a1(rgyud 'grel): gos su gyon// grags chen bde bas gang ba la// ha hA zhes sgrogs dpa' bo'i gang // hi hi zhes sgrogs dpa' mo'i gang // 'jigs par byed pa sngon bde myong // gang mo chen po bde chen thig/ gang
162a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyangs can ni ltung ba'i sgra// hA brgyad brjod pa rdo rje'i gang // cher sgrogs pa ni rgyun chad med// rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems// sems dpa' chen po dbyer med bde// rdo rje b+h+yo la rgyal po ni// de yi nang gan
162a3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba che// rdo rje drag po stong pa nyid// rtag tu de ldan dga'u ba che// rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrogs// zhes pa hUM bzhis gnas bzhir ni// dga' bzhi nyamasu myong ba'o// rdo rje a ba d+hU tI la// mnga' thogs pa ni mtshon
162a4(rgyud 'grel): cha can// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi rlung 'gags pa// mtshon chen de yis rnam rtog gcong // rdo rje gnyis med ye shes kyis// ral gri nyon mongs ma lus gcod// rdo rje rlung rnams kun 'chang ba// sna yi rtse mor
162a5(rgyud 'grel): yungs 'bru bsgom// de nyid nor bu rdo rje can// de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las// sna rtser yungs kar zhes brjod pa// de yang srog dang rtso lnga bar brjod// khams gsum+b+ha pa ni mA lus la// srid gsum gzugs
162a6(rgyud 'grel): brnyan mthong bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje gcig pu las rgyal// de badzin bde bas g.yul sel ba'o// rdo rje 'bar ba tsaN Da li// mig mi bzang ni ri dwags mig/ spyi bor rdo rje 'bar ba ste// zhes pa
162b1(rgyud 'grel): yar rtse mur rtse 'bar// rdo rje 'bebs pa bcu drug la// de yang phyed phyed 'bebs pa che// khams gsum phyag rgya chen por dbang // mig brgya pas te mang la bya// rdo rje mig ni sha yi spyan// de yis gzugs
162b2(rgyud 'grel): brnyan mthong ba'o// lus ni rdo rje ba spu can// tsos pa bA spu bye phyed bzhi// nang du thig le'i kha 'bu'o// de nyid rdo rje'i sku yin te// gcig pu lus ni rgyan chad med// sen mo dkar dmur 'dres pa las// skyes
162b3(rgyud 'grel): pA bde stong rdo rje'i rtse// mi 'dzag rtag tu dga' ba'i yid// rdo rje snying po rnam rtog med// pags pa mkhregs ni sgro na mi tshugs// rdo rje phreng 'dzin yul rtsa bzhir// thim dang longs spyod 'jug pa gsu
162b4(rgyud 'grel): nyin mtshan dus 'das dpal dang ldan// de 'dra'i byed gsum rdo rje rgyun// rnal 'byor lus lnga brgyan pa ste// kun la ba ba'i rgyang rgyangs ni// dga' chen ha ha nges par sgrogs// yi ge drug pa
162b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo drug/ rdo rje'i s+thA ni a krU re// 'gyur ba meng pa'i yi ge'o// 'jam dbyangs thig le chen po la// de ni myi 'phro sgra che ba// 'jig rten gsum na sgra gtsigs pa// ces pa bag pa dgra ga cog pu/
162b6(rgyud 'grel): de 'dul thabs chen stong gsum gyi// na mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa'o// sgra dang ldan pa theg chen chos// sna tshogs thebs lam bstan pa las// rnams kyi mchog gyur 'di nyid do// snying ga'i
163a1(rgyud 'grel): phyi yi rtsa bdun dang // 'og gi rtsa bzhi dri chen dang // dri chu khrag dang khwa b+hu 'bab// bcu gcig dag pa sh+lo ka/ bAcu dang tshig rkang gcig dag pa'o// rdo rje rigs kyi rgyu rjer+ya 'grel pa ste le'u
163a2(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa'o// // le'u brgyad pa 'od dpag med// pad+ma'i rigs kyi le'u la// tshigs bcang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bstan// de bzhin nyid ni d+hU ti'o// yang drag bdag
163a3(rgyud 'grel): med g.yas g.yon rlung // yang dag mtha' ste rlung grub pa// yi ge med ni rnam rtog mang // song nyid mi 'dzag gang ba'i sems// smra ba u la kA li la// khyu mchog bdung rnams 'joms pa ste// zab cing stong
163a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid rgya chen snang // dbyer med dbyer med sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung ste chos 'byung na// rtsa ni bde skyed dung can ma// bde ba dang ga med sgra chen ldan// chos kyi gaN+DI mgrin par gnas// brgyad khri bzhi stong
163a5(rgyud 'grel): chos stong po// sgra bo che ni gsung rdo rje// mi gnas phyag rgya chen po la// mya ngan 'das pa chos sku'o// phyogs bcu yul dung yul can te// chos kyi rnga chen rtswa rlung phub// gzugs med chos sku stong pa nyid//
163a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs bzang longs sku bang ba che// dam pa ste ni rdo rje'i sku// sna tshogs gzugs can sprul sku'o// yid ni bang chen spros bral las// skyes pa sku lnga'i bdag nyid do// gzugs rnams rgyud lnga'i 'khor/
163b1(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ d+ma thams cad rten dang brten bcas las// brten nas sku bzhi'i snang ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan nyin mtshan brtags bcu bzhi// ma lus 'chang ba thob pa'o// mtshungs pa med ni 'dod yon
163b2(rgyud 'grel): lngas/ mi gnod 'phel zhing cher grags pa// khams gsum dbring phyug chen po ste// bsod nams ye shes tshogs mthar phyin// lam dang 'bras bu gnyis yin no// 'phags pa nyams pa med pa'o//
163b3(rgyud 'grel): lem ni 'khor lo drug yin no// shin tu mtho ba gtsug tor la// thig le mi nyams gnas pa'o// chos kyi rtog ni rdo rje rtser// rgyas pa po ni bde bas gang // 'jig rten gsum ni lus ngag ying // gzhon lus
163b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig ni gsum pa'i dus// gnas brtan sprul pa'i 'khor lo la// rgan po lhan skyes ye shes so// skye dgu'i bdag ni bug dgu bsdams// de yang sgyu ma chen po las// mig gnyis dang ni rna ba gnyis//
163b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin sna dang kha dag dang // yid kyis snying po dgag pa ni// seng gi rnam grol phyag rgya che// rnal 'byor pa yis bcing bar bya// zhes gsungaso// de las skyes pa'i bde ba'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan
163b6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba// ces pa 'phel 'grib bcu drug go/ sdu gu gtum mo'i na chung la// 'khor gsum 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// 'jig rten mig la sogs pa la// shos legs skyon gyis ma gos par// ston
164a1(rgyud 'grel): pa slob dpon zhes brjod do// 'jig rten 'byung ba lnga ldan k+Sha// slob dpon bzhi pa ster ba ste// de la 'jig pa med pa mchog/ gnyis med sbyor ba mgon skyob po// 'jig rten yid bcugs
164a2(rgyud 'grel): don dam dang // kun rdzob phan tshun mi 'gal ba'o// sgrub dang 'bab pa skyeb pa ni// bzlog pas ye sh+yaMs bla na med// na mkha'u mtha' ni shes rab la// longs spyod pa ni gnyis med sbyor// thams
164a3(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa sbyor drug gis// rtags ma lus pa thob pa las// ye shes mtsho ni zang mi shes// yon tan chen pos gang ba'o// ma rig rten 'brel bcu gnyis la// sgo nga'i sbubs ni mi shes bsdu
164a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byed pa gsu ma byaM'i ye shes so// yang na lus la sangs rgyas ni// yod pa ma gtogs sgo nga'i sbubs// 'byed pa bla mas ye shes sbyor// 'di de lam mchog yin par gsungs// srid pa'i dra ba mi
164a5(rgyud 'grel): shes bsgribs// 'joms pa po ni rtogs pa'o// nyon mongs rtsa ba nye nyon mongs// mA lus zhi byed dga' ba bzhi// dbang bzhi las rnyed ye shes bzhi'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgya ste// pha rol phyin pa ya
164a6(rgyud 'grel): shes rgya// rgya gram gnyis med bde chen po// mchog tu mi 'gyur gang rnyed pa// de ni ye shes dbang bskur te// cod pan can ni gtsug tor smin// rdzogs pa rdo rje nor bu rtse// sangs rgyas bde chen nyams pa me
164b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun du thogs ni bde chen du// ye shes lnga ldan dbu rgyan no// gsum ni lus drag yid gsum la// sdug bsngal srog rtsol 'tsheng sregs myags// sdug bsngal zhi ni rtogs rlung 'gags// gsum sel dug
164b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum sel ba'o// mtha' yas lhan cig skyes dga' ba// grol gsum thob ni sku gsumo// sgrib pa sa chu me rlung mkha'// rags phra rab pra don spyi dang // sems dpa' dang nI bcu pa'o// kun las nges par
164b3(rgyud 'grel): grol ba ni// ngu ba la sogs bcu thob pa'o// de dus tsam na na mkha' ltar// lha ni skyes mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs dri ma gong gi bcu// kun las 'das pa mthar phyin pa'o// de yi dus na ldan skyes
164b4(rgyud 'grel): dor// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'o// de nyid phyag rgya chen por 'dod// sems tsan+da kun ni spang bya la// klu chen po ni gnyen po ste// dga' bzhi reg dug la sogs pa// 'dod sogs pham byas klu chen po'o// /
164b5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan theg po chen po lnga// thod can rnams ni gsang sngags te// zod ces de thod 'di yin no// nyon mongs kun lus ces pa ni// spyod dang thar pa 'dod pa'o// rnam par grol ni bde chen rtogs// rtsol ba med

165a1(rgyud 'grel): kun mchog phyag rgya chen po la// khyab pa'i bdag ni brtan g.yo la'o// dpag bsam shing chen d+hU tI la// rgyus pa rtsa rnams kun du ni// rlung dang thig les khyab pa'o// bum pa bzang
165a2(rgyud 'grel): po nor bu la// che ba'i mchog ni mi 'dzag bde// de yi byed pa ci zhe na// sems can gdul bya la dgongs nas// kun ngonas byed pa po de 'phel ba'o// phan 'dogs yon tan brgyad thob pas// sems can
165a3(rgyud 'grel): phan pas mnyen bshin pa// bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la// zhes pa phyi rol de bzhin nang // phyi rol rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyis// skye dang las drang phyogs nang dang // g.yo dang rkun po don rnams dang //

165a5(rgyud 'grel): seng ge bu mo srang // sdig pa gzhu 'dzin bcu gnyis kyis// nyi ma zla ba shes pa'o// de yis rang 'byung la sogs shes// ngam shes lus ngag ye shos shes// ngam ldan shes rab ma lA ni// brtse dang shugs
165a6(rgyud 'grel): ngang drud pa dang // mi 'dzag bde ba dam tshig bzhis// lus sems kun du khyab pa'i bdag/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba las gsungs pa// mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar rgyug pa'i// rab tu rgyug cing 'phro ba'i sems//

165b2(rgyud 'grel): shes// rnam grol gsum dam las ye shes// mkhas pa po ni sa 'og sogs// dbang thob nas ni yon tan gyis// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa rnams// ldan zhing de la ye shes ldan// yon tan shes shes

165b4(rgyud 'grel): snyan grags dge ba thob// chags sngogs ma spangs dbugs 'byin che// tshim par byed pa dga' ston tshe// dga' chen lhan skyes rol pa ni// mig 'phrul lta bu'i snang ba la// chen po don dam phyag rgya che//

165b6(rgyud 'grel): lhan skyes yong pa las// ma chog sbyin bzhi pa'i gtso bo ste// de nyid skyabs kyi dam pa dang // gnyen por che bas skyabasu 'os// 'jig rten dgra ni dug gsum ste// rab kyi mcho ga ni bde stong ngo //
166a1(rgyud 'grel): de yis 'jigs pa ma lus pa// shin du med pas sel ba'o// gtsug phung 'khor ba'i bde ba la// phung pu dbang gis rab tu bcings// lcang lo can ni gzhan don du// mdzes shing rgyas
166a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'grengs pa'o// ral pa gnyisu med par sdom// lan tshar cod pan thogs ldan pa'o// gdong lnga ye shes lnga yin te// gtsug pud lnga dang ldan pa ni// rigs lnga dag dang ldan pa'o// gnas skabs lnga

166a4(rgyud 'grel): ma rnyed pa// bde ba chen po 'dzin pa ni// tshangs par spyod pa mi nyams pa// brtul zhugs mchog kyang de nyid do// dka' thub nyan thos mthar thug pa// pha rol phyin pa dka' thub che// rdo rje'i theg pa nyid
